trans-unit.source: Specifies that serializers should handle default values.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化程式應該處理預設值。

trans-unit.source: This means that instead of serializing only values that differ from an object's default values, all values are serialized, allowing values to be reset to their defaults for objects that may have already been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，而非序列化物件的預設值不同的值，所有值都會加以都序列化，允許重設為其預設值可能已初始化的物件值。

trans-unit.source: When a component serialization service wishes to indicate this behavior to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer> objects, it will place a SerializeAbsoluteContext object on the context stack.
trans-unit.target: 元件序列化服務希望表示此行為，以<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>物件，它將 SerializeAbsoluteContext 物件在堆疊上放置內容。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The member in this context may be `null`, to indicate that all members are serialized, or it can indicate that only a specific member is being serialized at this time.
trans-unit.target: 在此內容中的成員可能`null`，以表示已序列化的所有成員，或可能表示在此階段都序列化特定成員。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Using the default constructor indicates that this context should be used for all members.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設建構函式，以指出此內容適用於所有成員。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext"></xref> class with the option of binding to a specific member.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializeAbsoluteContext"></xref>類別繫結至特定成員的選項。

trans-unit.source: If `member` is `null`, this context will be used for all members.
trans-unit.target: 如果`member`是`null`，將使用此內容的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: The member to which this context is bound.
Gets the member to which this context is bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得此內容會繫結的成員。

trans-unit.source: The member to which this context is bound, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the context is bound to all members of an object.
trans-unit.target: 要繫結此內容，該成員或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>內容是否繫結至物件的所有成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the given member should be serialized in this context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出此內容中是否應該序列化指定的成員。

trans-unit.source: The member to be examined for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查以進行序列化的成員。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the given member should be serialized in this context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該序列化指定的成員，在此內容中，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
